sentences.en: Documentation can be ambiguous in the most insidious ways.
sentences.cn: 文档可能有很多模糊不清的微妙之处。

sentences.en: His role in the affair is ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 他在这起事件中的角色并不明确。

sentences.en: His thoughts, ambiguous and indefinite, troubled him.
sentences.cn: 他心里的想法含含混混,理不清楚, 使他苦恼.

sentences.en: However, the evidence is thin and, to some extent, ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 然而，这个证据难以令人信服，而且有点模棱两可。

sentences.en: In fact, your ambiguous words amount to a refusal.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 你说的那些模棱两可的话等于是拒绝.

sentences.en: It will be seen that the term " internal work product " is ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 可以看出,术语 “ 内乘积功 ” 有两种解释.

sentences.en: Perhaps, but the contrast is ambiguous and unclear.
sentences.cn: 也许可以，但对比却是模糊不清的。

sentences.en: Pictographs can be ambiguous until you learn their meaning.
sentences.cn: 表意图形可能会模棱两可,直到你如果确实了解其意思.

sentences.en: Students have ambiguous feelings about their role in the world.
sentences.cn: 学生们对于自己在这个世界上的角色认识模糊不清。

sentences.en: The language in the Minister’s statement is highly ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 部长的声明措辞很含糊。

sentences.en: The last paragraph of your letter under reply is ambiguous. Please clarify.
sentences.cn: 你方来信的最后一段意义不明确, 请澄清.

sentences.en: The phrasing of the report is ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 这份报告的措辞模棱两可。

sentences.en: The title of this chapter is ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 这一章的标题含义模糊.

sentences.en: The wording is so ambiguous that it leads to misinterpretations.
sentences.cn: 措辞晦涩,致使人误解本意.
这里的措辞故意模棱两可。

sentences.en: This agreement is very ambiguous and open to various interpretations.
sentences.cn: 这份协议非常含糊，可以有多种解释。

sentences.en: This sentence is ambiguous in sense.
To judge by one rather ambiguous drawing they trapped and killed it.
sentences.cn: 从一幅模糊不清的画来判断,他们利用陷阱将其捕获,然后杀死.

words.tran_cn: 模棱两可的,模糊不清的

trans.tran_cn: 模棱两可的，不明确的，捉摸不定的
trans.tran_en: something that is ambiguous is unclear, confusing, or not certain, especially because it can be understood in more than one way
